Scan / search product by code or name: Kokota / koluka biloko na code to nkombo
Please follow the instructions below to: Tika bokiti oyo ezali nse mpo na kokoma file na yo.
Download the sample file first and add a: Kokoma file ya sample liboso mpe kokoma biloko nyonso na yango.
Indicates a required field. If you do no: Ezalaka na bokiti ya mposa. Soki olingi te kosala bokiti ya mposa, systeme ekotisa biloko.
After adding all your products, please s: Liboso ya kokoma biloko nyonso, tika kokoma file mpe kokoma version oyo ekomi.
The name of the product you are adding (: Nkombo ya biloko oyo olingi kokoma (e.g., "Banana").
The category under which the product fal: Kategoria oyo biloko ezali (e.g., Beverages, Electronics).
If the system does not find this, it wil: Soki systeme ekoki te, ekomi moko.
The measurement unit used for the produc: Mbongo ya kosala mpo na biloko (e.g., Piece, Kg, Litre, Box).
The brand or manufacturer associated wit: Brand to moto ya kosala oyo ezali na biloko (e.g., Samsung, Nestlé).
The available quantity of the product cu: Bokiti ya biloko oyo ezali na esika ya kobongisa.
A unique code for the product, often use: Kode moko ya biloko, oyo ekoki kosalema na barcode to na kokoma na kombo ya biloko.
Product codes must be unique. If a code: Bokiti ya biloko esengeli kozala moko. Soki kode ezali kosalema, mpe okanisi kode moko ya biloko oyo ezali kosalema, systeme ekotika biloko yango.
The cost price of the product without in: Mbongo ya biloko, soki VAT ezali te.
Maximum Retail Price — the highest price: Mbongo ya biloko oyo ezali na esika ya kopesa na bato.
Special discounted price for resellers o: Mbongo ya biloko oyo ezali na esika ya kopesa na bato oyo bazali kosomba mingi.
The price offered for bulk purchases, ty: Mbongo oyo ekoki kosalema na biloko oyo ezali na esika ya kopesa na bato.
The name of the VAT (Value Added Tax) ap: Kombo ya VAT (Taxe sur la Valeur Ajoutée) oyo esalemi na biloko.
If the system does not find an existing: Soki systeme ekoki te komona VAT oyo ezali, ekosala moko ya sika mpe ekosala mbongo ya VAT na esika ya kombo ya VAT oyo oponi na kolone.
The percentage of VAT (Value Added Tax): Peresanti ya VAT (Taxe sur la Valeur Ajoutée) oyo esalemi na biloko.
Whether the VAT is added on top of the p: Soki VAT ekoki kosalema na esika ya mbongo (exclusive) to ezali na mbongo (inclusive).
The quantity threshold to alert when sto: Bokiti ya biloko oyo ekoki kosalema soki bokiti ezali na esika ya kopesa na bato.
The name of the company or entity that p: Kombo ya kompani to esika oyo esalemi biloko.
The expiry date for the product, useful: Mokolo ya kokufa ya biloko, oyo ezali na esika ya kopesa na biloko oyo ekoki kosalema.
After adding all your parties, please sa: Soki okanisi biloko nyonso, s'il vous plaît save file mpe upload version ya sika.
Enter the official name of the party you: Koma kombo ya esika oyo okanisi.
Select the type of party. (For Customers: Tala ndenge ya esika. (Pour Clients: Retailer / Wholesaler / Dealer; Pour Fournisseur: Fournisseur)
Enter the phone number of the party (opt: Koma numero ya telefone ya esika (optionnel).
Enter the due amount for this party (opt: Koma montant ya esika ya esika (optionnel).
